member.name: ID3D11SamplerState.GetDesc
member.summary: Gets the description for sampler state that you used to create the sampler-state object.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the sampler state.

member.name: ID3D11SamplerState
member.summary: The sampler-state interface holds a description for sampler state that you can bind to any shader stage of the pipeline for reference by texture sample operations.
